# Overview

(more explanations here)
Each integration point provides a set of inputs for use in your R scripts, leaving it up to you to determine if and how they should be utilized.

For detailed information about each integration point, please refer to the following pages:

1. [Initialization](IntegrationPointInitialization.html)
2. [Analysis](IntegrationPointAnalysis.html)
3. [Enrollment](IntegrationPointEnrollment.html)
4. [Randomization](IntegrationPointRandomization.html)
5. [Response](IntegrationPointResponse.html)
6. [Dropout](IntegrationPointDropout.html)
